naslov: 2 beautiful modern villas situated in a quiet location / VIDEO (prodaja)
opis: - Exclusive sales agency #adriaINgroup - The buyer pays the agency fee 3% of the selling price VIDEO You Tube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=26mJPdXiADM&t=6s Dear clients, the tour of the real estate is possible only with a signed brokerage agreement which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, all in accordance with the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Two 'twins' beautiful modern villas situated in a quiet location in Kastel Kambelovac, only 250 m from the sea. - total living area 400m2 - plot 500m2 ................................... - one villa is 200m2 on 250m2 plot Its exterior and interior architecture delight in simplicity and modern style. This two villas is designed on two floors connected by the internal stairs and the central gallery with a total of 2x5 bedrooms and 2x5 bathrooms. The one has a total of 202 m2, with its luxurious interior, open and covered terrace, swimming pool, fireplace and exterior shower with a beautiful well-groomed garden. The pebble beach, restaurant, center of Kastel and all necessary facilities are only 300 m from the Villa, and in the center you can feel the magic of the traditional Dalmatian fishing village. In the vicinity of the villa you can visit many historical sites of the town of Kastela, and 13 km away you can visit two Croatian historical pearls under the protection of Unesco – Trogir and Split. The beauty and accessibility of this villa will enchant you and provide you with a deserved break from everyday life. #adriaINgroup realestate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
